text: Christopher High School is a co-educational public school in Gilroy, California. It is one of two public comprehensive high schools in the city and has an approximate enrollment of 1,900 students. It is a part of the Gilroy Unified School District. The school is named for the Christopher family, owner of the Christopher Ranch, a local garlic farm that is one of the largest employers in Gilroy. Christopher donated 10 acres of land and started an endowment for the school with an initial investment of $75,000.http://chs.gusd.ca.schoolloop.com/cms/page_view?d=x&piid;=&vpid;=1226557177670 == Athletics == {| class="wikitable" |- !
